title: Daraz Online Shopping App
summary: Experience the joy of online shopping at the best prices, right from your phone.

descriptionHTML:
★ DARAZ: YOUR ONLINE SHOPPING APP - Use code ‘APP500’ to get Rs. 500 OFF! ★
Payment on delivery with safe & secure payments 🚚

Purchase protection with 100% genuine products and free and easy returns 🔒

Largest selection at the best prices 👚

Download the Daraz App and use voucher code ‘APP500’ to get Rs. 500 off on your first purchase!

Here is what others think of the Daraz App:

** The Express Tribune **
"Daraz.pk’s user-friendly mobile app, is perfect for customers on the go"

** Techjuice.pk **
“The application has a user-friendly interface with swiping as primary navigation option for different categories.”

**ProPakistani**
“The user interface that is muted and appealing is optimized for android users.”

Features:
★Exclusive Offers & Daily Deals Notifications on Mobile App.
★Product Feedback and Ratings by Customers
★Weekly Discount Deals
★Easy online shopping with cart sync between site and app
★Recently viewed items can easily be checked
★Option of browsing based on category and brand
★Filter your searches by price, discount and popularity
How it Works:
✔️ Download Daraz shopping app on to your mobile phone
✔️ View high quality product images and read detailed product descriptions & reviews from previous customers.
✔️ Still not sure? No problem, simply add the product to your wish list. Once you are, come back, add it to your cart and continue your online shopping.
✔️ Easy payment options that offer fast and secure online shopping. Choose between VISA / MasterCard, bank transfer or simply cash on delivery.
Categories
The Daraz online shopping app lets you purchase from multiple categories:

Phones & Tablets

Top Android operated brands like Samsung, Qmobile, Huawei, Infinix, Mi etc and IOS operated iPhone 6, 6s and 7 including mobile accessories.

Women’s Fashion

Latest online shopping in Pakistan for Women Fashion including eastern and western wear, shoes, bags and accessories

Men’s Fashion

Trendy and crisp online fashion for men fashion including apparel, shoes, bags and accessories.

Appliances

Large or small, all sort of home and kitchen appliances.

Computing and Gaming

Best shopping app for computing, storage devices, gaming consoles, video games and other gaming accessories.

TVs, Audio and Cameras

Latest Televisions from different brands, audio and video devices, digital and compact cameras and accessories.

Grocer’s Shop

Online shopping for breakfast items, canned products, beverages, snacks, laundry and home care products.

Other Categories

Other categories include beauty & health, home & living, sports & travel, baby toys & kids, books, stationery, lifestyle accessories, automotive and motorcycles, equipment and tickets & vouchers.

Customer Service
We’d love your Feedback! Also, if you face any technical issues, drop us a line at support.app@daraz.com

If you have any queries or complaints regarding service related issues such as late delivery or returns, please reach out to us at:

Pakistan: customer@daraz.pk

Bangladesh: customer.care@daraz.com.bd

Sri Lanka: support@daraz.lk

Nepal: cs@daraz.np

**DARAZ IS ONLY OPERATIONAL IN PAKISTAN, BANGLADESH, SRI LANKA AND NEPAL**
comments: I know daraz is a very good place to shop by online. But suddenly I ordered a hot wheels from daraz.I got a massage from daraz which told me they are giving my hot wheels In 8 hours. But it is almost 24 hours but my hot wheels isn't arrived. I call the man who was delivering my parcel told me he couldn't gave my parcel that day. His name was RAJU DELIVER. He told me he may give my parcel today . But where is it . This makes me very dissatisfied from daraz.

I love daraz. I've been shopping on daraz for years. The thing is, some of the makeup products on daraz are bit too pricey. I can actually go to a local store and find the same products in much cheaper price. I don't know why you guys are charging 100/200 bucks extra. But I still love you anyway ‚ù§

This is a very good app for online shopping. I am very fond of it. But about 3 months ago I ordered a card for PLAY STATION for 2500 rs. When I used it, I came to know that it is expired. I called the man who shipped it but he did not give a reasonable response. This isn't a good fact about the app

When i ordered something it says that my number is invailed but i give them all right information but they all time says it is invalied this is the worst online shopping app i ever seen     Updated:- ididnt putted +88 before my number. And their product quality is good enough. It has some small bugs pls fix that in next update

Poor service, poor business strategy. I made a few orders and every order came separately which is very irritating and inconvenient. I requested to store all my orders as they arrive and ship to me altogether. Also, the Treadmill was delivered to me not set. I had to set it up myself. They delivery guys don't understand written addresses and calls over and over.

Cheated From Daraz I ordered some products.  They have too many issues. Can't deliver every item in 1 period of time. Delivery rate is slow.  Response rate is poor. Then one item they gave me something else instead of something I ordered for.
recentChanges: We‚Äôre excited to announce some new features that will improve your shopping experience!
If you like these changes, please let us know by rating and reviewing us in the Play Store!
